body:
Scrim - Apollo vs Dronken (OCN):https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y1i3KnSDRSM&feature=youtu.be
The final score was 2 games to one to them. I only uploaded this one because the others were pretty boring from my pov. I am making this thread because the video hub seemed pointless. Anyway Enjoy!
